title: New lvl 4 rewards problem
body: Hello everyone! So recently i made two new accounts the first one and i also had another one i normally opened my first chest which was the premium chest that you get after reaching level 3 they replaced it with the 400 rp you used to get when i started playing on my other account and reached level three i didn't earn my premium chest has anyone else been facing these problems?

replies.body: just send a ticket you are supposed to get it

if anyone has problems just say it so i know i'm not the only one. Please don't put in links here. if you think that they'll work and you're sure post it it might help some people and might help me. Thank you if you comment here i really appreciate it.
